sourcesContent:
const simpleCode = ` A simple Dismiss `; const disabledCode = ` This is disabled `; const childrenCode = `
Card title

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Go somewhere
`; const customClassCode = ` This Dismiss has custom class `; const customThemeCode = ` Primary theme Secondary theme Dark theme Light theme Info theme Warning theme Danger theme Success theme `; const customColorCode = ` Dismiss with custom background color `; const sizeCode = ` Small Dismiss Medium Dismiss Large Dismiss Custom Size Dismiss `; const customEventCode = ` alert('Closed')}> This Dismiss has event handler `; export { simpleCode, disabledCode, customThemeCode, customColorCode, customEventCode, childrenCode, customClassCode, sizeCode, };
